text: László Kuncz (29 July 1957 – 6 December 2020) was a Hungarian water polo player. He competed in the 1980 Summer Olympics, winning a bronze medal. Kuncz died on 6 December 2020 at the age of 63.Meghalt Kuncz László 200-szoros válogatott vízilabdázó ==References== Category:1957 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Hungary
title: László Kuncz
